recipe.title: How to Make Lemon Meringue Pie
recipe.intro: Lemon meringue pie has a buttery crust, tangy lemon filling, and fluffy meringue on top. It is a classic dessert loved in Australia.
recipe.ingredients: butter, sugar, flour, eggs, lemons, cornflour, water, caster sugar, vanilla extract
steps: **Mix** the flour and butter together until it looks like breadcrumbs. **Add** a little water and **press** into a pie tin.
**Bake** the crust at 180 degrees for 15 minutes until light golden.
**Squeeze** the lemons to get the juice. **Mix** lemon juice, sugar, cornflour, and water in a pot.
**Heat** the mixture on the stove and **stir** until it becomes thick. **Add** egg yolks and **stir** again.
**Pour** the lemon filling into the baked crust and let it cool.
**Whisk** the egg whites and caster sugar until stiff peaks form. **Spread** the meringue on top and **bake** at 180 degrees for 10 minutes until golden.

quiz1.explanation_correct: æ­£è§£ï¼"Bake at 180 degrees for 10 minutes until golden."

review.text: I visited Reef Gateway CafÃ© last weekend with my friend Emma. We sat outside near the esplanade. I ordered a slice of lemon meringue pie and a flat white. The pie was amazing. The lemon filling was sweet and sour, and the meringue was so light. Emma had a blueberry muffin. We both loved this cafÃ©. The staff were very friendly. I will come back soon!

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Hello! Welcome to our cafÃ©. What can I get you?

lines.speaker: Oliver
lines.text: Hi! What desserts do you have today?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: We have lemon meringue pie, carrot cake, and banana bread.

lines.speaker: Oliver
lines.text: The lemon meringue pie sounds nice. Is it made fresh?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Yes, our chef makes it every morning.

lines.speaker: Oliver
lines.text: Great! I will have a slice, please.

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Sure! Would you like a drink with that?

lines.speaker: Oliver
lines.text: Yes, can I have a flat white?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: Of course. Would you like regular or large?

lines.speaker: Oliver
lines.text: Regular is fine. How much is everything?

lines.speaker: You
lines.text: That will be fifteen dollars. You can tap your card here.

part_a.full_text: Mum, can we make lemon meringue pie today? Of course! Do we have enough lemons? I think we have four lemons in the fridge. Perfect, we need three. Can you squeeze them for me? Sure! I will get a bowl for the juice. Great. I will start making the crust with butter and flour. What about the meringue? We need to whisk the egg whites until they are stiff. That is my favourite part!

part_b.full_text: Good afternoon, everyone. This is Sunshine Bakery CafÃ©. This week we have a special dessert menu. On Monday and Tuesday, we have lemon meringue pie. On Wednesday and Thursday, we have passionfruit tart. On Friday, Saturday, and Sunday, we have mango cheesecake. All desserts are eight dollars fifty per slice. If you buy a dessert with a coffee, you get one dollar off. The cafÃ© is open from seven in the morning until four in the afternoon. We hope to see you soon!

try_it.example: I love lemon meringue pie. The lemon filling is sweet and sour. I want to try making it at home this weekend.
